title: Employee names, job titles and salaries 2022 to present

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Employee names, job titles and salaries 2022 to present
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following public records:

Please provide me with a list, preferably in Excel format, of the Volusia County government employee names, job titles and description, and their monthly salaries from January 1st, 2022 to the present date, for the following departments and divisions including but not limited to:

1) Volusia County Council
2) Volusia County Growth and Resource Management
3) Volusia County Building and Code Administration
4) Volusia County Contractor Licensing and Construction Appeals Board
5)  Volusia County Code Compliance
6)  Volusia County Building and Permit Center
7)  Volusia County Contractor Licensing

If possible, I would respectfully ask that any fees be waived as this information is of interest to the general public. The requested information will be made available to the general public, as well as to news and media outlets, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.  

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 21 days or sooner.

Sincerely,

Lourdes Gonzalez
